data.author: John Navas

changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.4: Tweak display layout
Adjust size and position of text to optimize display, especially on original Pebble (Aplite).
Version 1.3: To highlight less than 1 minute to Start, original Pebble (Aplite) now inverts to white text on black background. (Pebble Time uses orange background.)
Version 1.2: Larger fonts for greater legibility.
Version 1.1: Support added for original Pebble and Pebble Steel.

data.description:
Starting Timer for Yacht Racing

Counts down to Start with vibration alerts. Multiple operation modes. Developed by experienced sailboat racer.

FEATURES:

Large easy-to-read display with all relevant data and color highlighting.

Standard 5 minute starting sequence by default, but initial number of minutes can be changed.

Short vibrations at 4 minutes, and at seconds from 10 down to Start, long vibrations at 1 minute and at Start.

Jump to prior minute, next minute, or sync to clock by button press.

Remembers timer Mode and Start time when not running.

Wakes up automatically if not running at 10 seconds before Start.

COLOR:

Yellow background for more than 1 minute to Start.
Red background for less than 1 minute to Start.
Green background for count up after Start.

MODES:

Rolling: from one Start into next Start.
Down-Up: counts down to Start and then counts up.
Down-Stop: counts down to Start and stops.

BUTTONS

Top: Jump timer to prior minute.
Long press to stop and reset to initial value or change initial value.

Middle: Start/pause timer toggle.
Long press to sync Start time to nearest clock minute.

Bottom: Jump timer to next minute.
Long press to rotate timer Mode.

CATEGORY: Sailing
